DOC.criteria: In order recruit population relative risk develop CVD > 1.5 male age 3555 year , possess one follow risk factor CVD recruit local advertisement : Total cholesterol > 6mmol/L High density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDLC ) < 1.0mmol/L Systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Waist circumference > 102cm Current smoker , exsmokers cease < 3 month ago Subjects exist significant past medical history vascular disease medical condition likely affect study measure e.g . vascular disease , circulatory ( i.e . Reynaud 's ) , diabetes , systemic lupus erythematosus , hepatic , renal , digestive , haematological , neurological , cancer thyroidal disease . Those known allergy intervention food / commercially available supplement . Those unprepared adhere dietary restriction trial i.e . 3 day precede assessment visit ( 3 day runin period ) unwilling comply assessment per protocol . Parallel participation another research project involve concurrent dietary intervention and/or sample biological fluids/material . Having vaccination ( exclude flu vaccination ) antibiotic within 3 month start trial , vaccination schedule trial . Taking EPA DHA contain food / dietary supplement likely affect study result e.g . supplement derive marine organism equate great 1 gram EPA DHA per daily serve . Prospective participant willing cease supplementation 2 month preceding , , trial consider case case basis . Habitual consumption one portion oily fish per week ( defined 140g oil fish , include salmon , trout , mackerel , sardine , pilchard , herring , kipper , eel , whitebait , etc ) . Prescribed lipid lowering , medicine affect lipoprotein metabolism blood blotting , hypertension , vasodilator ( e.g . Viagra ) antibiotic medication . Assessed clinical screening .
